# Getting started {#getting-started}
Here are some ideas:

* Try the [starters guide](https://tercen.github.io/starters-guide2/)
* Look at the [Tercen youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNM03GeEXQlz9kO-yhtLtfA)
* There are also some extra online material found in the [learn section](https://learn.tercen.com) of our website.
* For app developers read the online [__developers guide__](https://tercen.github.io/developers_guide/)
* [Contact us](support@tercen.com) for an online one-2-one session
* Give feedback on this book by creating an [issue](https://github.com/tercen/tercen-book/issues)
* Give feedback on Tercen by sending an email to `support@tercen.com`
* Try the Tercen API by using the [`teRcen`](https://github.com/tercen/tercen) R package.
